name: Path of Titans
author: dev@shepper.fr
description: Path of Titans is an MMO dinosaur video game currently in active development for home computers and mobile devices fully compatible with cross platform play. Play as one of 18 core dinosaurs in a rich ecosystem filled with complex AI creatures and up to 200 other players.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates

# Installation dependencies to make it work
apt-get install wget -y

apt-get install -y libicu-dev

# Temporary file directory for installation
mkdir /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Pulling necessary file to begin server installation
wget https://launcher-cdn.alderongames.com/AlderonGamesCmd-Linux-x64

# Setting that file as an executable
chmod u+x AlderonGamesCmd-Linux-x64

# Running server installation and downloading necessary files
echo Updating Server Files
./AlderonGamesCmd-Linux-x64 --game path-of-titans --server true --beta-branch $BRANCH_TYPE --auth-token $AUTH_TOKEN

# Setting startup executable permissions
cd ./PathOfTitans/Binaries/Linux/
chmod u+x PathOfTitansServer-Linux-Shipping

variables.name: Server GUID
variables.description: Set a randomly generated GUID for the server. Has to be unique. https://www.guidgenerator.com/

variables.name: Auth Token
variables.description: Requires an Auth Token generated from the Alderon Games website. https://alderongames.com/oauth/hosting-token

variables.name: Branch Type
variables.description: Sets the branch type of the game to be installed. Valid types are "demo-public-test" and "production".

variables.name: Database Type
variables.description: Sets the database type on whether to be local or remote.
